title: Pakistan's Punjab govt extends smart lockdowns in COVID-19 hotspots
description: Islamabad [Pakistan], April 13 (ANI): In view of the incessant surge in daily COVID-19 cases, authorities in Pakistan's Punjab province on Tuesday announced the extension of smart lockdowns, enforced in COVID-19 hotspots, till April 26.

title: Amid Covid surge and curbs, Punjab set for 9-day mega job fair

title: Covid-19 second wave dispersing to more states; MP, Punjab lagging behind in vaccination, says report
description: Gujarat and Chhattisgarh, which are among the more affected in the second wave, have vaccinated relatively more people per million as of April 11 but "Punjab and Madhya Pradesh, which continue to show high growth rate in new cases, are lagging behind," the report said.

title: 55 more die in Punjab as nation sees 72,330 new Covid cases
description: Death toll mounts to 1,62,927 with 459 new fatalities New Delhi, April 1 India recorded its highest daily rise in COVID-19 cases this year with 72,330 new infections being reported in a span of 24 hours, taking the total tally of cases to 1,22,21,665, according to the Union Health Ministry data updated on Thursday.

title: Do house-to-house surveillance to contain Covid surge: Centre to Punjab, Chandigarh
description: Health secretary reviews surge in the state and UT; DCs of high-burden districts attend The Centre on Wednesday reviewed the sharp COVID surge in Punjab and Chandigarh after Punjab reported 21 per cent week-on-week increase in new COVID cases and 2,740 average daily cases over the last seven days.
